definition: not to hear, not to question (idiom)/to show no interest in sth/uncritical/not in the least concerned
(negative prefix)/not/no
surname Wen
to hear/news/well-known/famous/reputation/fame/to smell/to sniff at
(negative prefix)/not/no
to ask

sentences.english: Do you live in luxury without caring for the needy?
sentences.chinese: 你是否生活奢侈，卻對有需要的人不聞不問？

sentences.english: He shut his ears to all appeals for help.
sentences.chinese: 他對於一切求助的呼聲都不聞不問。

sentences.english: I can't ignore your rudeness any longer.
sentences.chinese: 對於你的粗暴無禮，我再也不能不聞不問了。

sentences.english: People with brown skins are next door to invisible.
sentences.chinese: 這些棕色人種對鄰居也是不聞不問。

sentences.english: We can't remain indifferent when any comrade is in difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 同志們有困難我們不能不聞不問。

sentences.english: Government should take it hard with the Ukrainian part.
sentences.chinese: 印度政府不聞不問的，印度人成爲了軟柿子。
